name: ORS Current National Paid and Unpaid Activities

dataset.name: AA - DZ ORS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.DESCRIPTION, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, ROUND(((AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.END_TIME - AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 3600, 2) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_SCHEDULES AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROGRAM_PROFILES AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_OFFENDER_PRG_PRF_PAY_BANDS AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_SCH_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_SCH_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFF_PRGREF_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID = AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.OFF_PRGREF_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.START_DATE AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE <= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE OR AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE IS NULL)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME BETWEEN 'AA' AND 'DZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (NOT V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_STATUS IN ('CANC', 'SUS')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND NOT AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE IS NULL AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, PAY_BAND_CODE, DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: EA - KZ ORS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT_DESCR34, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, ROUND(((AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.END_TIME - AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 3600, 2) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_SCHEDULES AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROGRAM_PROFILES AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_OFFENDER_PRG_PRF_PAY_BANDS AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_SCH_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_SCH_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFF_PRGREF_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID = AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.OFF_PRGREF_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.START_DATE AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE <= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE OR AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE IS NULL)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME BETWEEN 'EA' AND 'KZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (NOT V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_STATUS IN ('CANC', 'SUS')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND NOT AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE IS NULL AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, PAY_BAND_CODE, DESCRIPTION, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT_DESCR34, HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: LA - RZ ORS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT_DESCR34, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, ROUND(((AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.END_TIME - AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 3600, 2) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_SCHEDULES AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROGRAM_PROFILES AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_OFFENDER_PRG_PRF_PAY_BANDS AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_SCH_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_SCH_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFF_PRGREF_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID = AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.OFF_PRGREF_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.START_DATE AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE <= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE OR AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE IS NULL)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME BETWEEN 'LA' AND 'RZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (NOT V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_STATUS IN ('CANC', 'SUS')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND NOT AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE IS NULL AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, PAY_BAND_CODE, AGY_LOC_ID, ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT_DESCR34, HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: SA - ZZ ORS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT_DESCR34, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, ROUND(((AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.END_TIME - AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 3600, 2) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_SCHEDULES AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROGRAM_PROFILES AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.V_OFFENDER_PRG_PRF_PAY_BANDS AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_SCH_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_SCH_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFF_PRGREF_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID = AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.OFF_PRGREF_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.START_DATE AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE <= AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE OR AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.END_DATE IS NULL)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES_AGENCY.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME BETWEEN 'SA' AND 'ZZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (NOT V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_STATUS IN ('CANC', 'SUS')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND NOT AT_V_OFFENDER_PAY_BANDS.PAY_BAND_CODE IS NULL AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, PAY_BAND_CODE, HALY_DAY_RATE_BAS, AGY_LOC_ID, ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT_DESCR34, HALY_DAY_RATE_STD, HALY_DAY_RATE_ENH, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: AA - CZ MIS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SUSPENDED_FLAG, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE) AS OFFENDER_ALLOCATION_START_DATE, (((AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.END_TIME - AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 3600) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION_HO31 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME BETWEEN 'AA' AND 'CZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y') AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE) <= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, SUSPENDED_FLAG, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ALLOCATION_START_DATE, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION_HO31 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: DA - GZ MIS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SUSPENDED_FLAG, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE) AS OFFENDER_ALLOCATION_START_DATE, (((AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.END_TIME - AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 3600) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION_HO31 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME BETWEEN 'DA' AND 'GZ' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y') AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_START_DATE) <= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, SUSPENDED_FLAG, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ALLOCATION_START_DATE, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DURATION_HO31 FROM dataset_base_)
